com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2GeometryBufferUsableType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLResourceSizedType, com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLResourceUsableType, R2RenderTargetUsableType<R2GeometryBufferDescriptionType>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    R2GeometryBufferType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2GeometryBuffer

    public interface R2GeometryBufferUsableType
extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<R2GeometryBufferDescriptionType>
    The type of usable geometry buffers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R2Texture2DUsableType albedoEmissiveTexture() 
      R2Texture2DUsableType depthTexture() 
      default R2Texture2DUsableType getSpecularTextureOrDefault(R2TextureDefaultsType td)
      Return either the allocated specular texture, or a suitable default replacement that behaves as if the geometry buffer contains no specular components.

      • getSpecularTextureOrDefault

        default R2Texture2DUsableType getSpecularTextureOrDefault(R2TextureDefaultsType td)
        Return either the allocated specular texture, or a suitable default replacement that behaves as if the geometry buffer contains no specular components.
        Parameters:
        td - The texture defaults
        Returns:
        A specular texture, or a default replacement

      • depthTexture

        R2Texture2DUsableType depthTexture()
        Returns:
        The depth/stencil texture
